sourcesContent:
import s from './StylePizzaOrder/PizzaOrder.module.css' import React from "react"; import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; class AllOrder extends React.Component { state = { size: this.props.size, cost: this.props.pizza.cost, ves: this.props.ves, pizza: { photoURL: this.props.pizza.photoURL, name: this.props.pizza.name, structure: this.props.pizza.structure, }, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.no } NewSize28 = () => { this.setState({ size: 28, cost: this.props.pizza.cost, ves: 370, style_line28: s.line28, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.no }) } NewSize33 = () => { if (this.state.cost < this.props.pizza.cost * 3 || this.state.cost > this.props.pizza.cost * 2.6) { this.setState({ size: 33, cost: this.props.pizza.cost * 2.7, ves: 580, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.line33, style_line45: s.no }) } } NewSize45 = () => { if (this.state.cost <= this.props.pizza.cost * 4) { this.setState({ size: 45, cost: this.props.pizza.cost * 4, ves: 1240, style_line28: s.no, style_line33: s.no, style_line45: s.line45 }) } } render() { let item if (this.props.number < 14) { item =
Меню/ Пица/ {this.state.pizza.name}
{this.state.pizza.name}
{Math.round(this.state.cost)} грн
{this.state.pizza.structure}
Вага: {this.state.ves}
Розмір піци: {this.state.size}
28 см
_______
33 см
_______
45 см
_______
} else if (this.props.number >= 14 && this.props.number < 20) { item =
Меню/ Напитки/ {this.props.drink[this.props.number].name}
{this.props.drink[this.props.number].name}
{Math.round(this.props.drink[this.props.number].cost)} грн
{this.props.drink[this.props.number].structure}
} return (
{item}
) } } export default AllOrder
